schema.title: StimulationStage
schema.description: A Stage treated during a Stimulation Job.

id.description: Previously called ResourceID or SRN which identifies this OSDU resource object without version.
id.title: Entity ID

kind.description: The schema identification for the OSDU resource object following the pattern {Namespace}:{Source}:{Type}:{VersionMajor}.{VersionMinor}.{VersionPatch}. The versioning scheme follows the semantic versioning, https://semver.org/.
kind.title: Entity Kind

version.description: The version number of this OSDU resource; set by the framework.
version.title: Version Number

acl.description: The access control tags associated with this entity.
acl.title: Access Control List

legal.description: The entity's legal tags and compliance status. The actual contents associated with the legal tags is managed by the Compliance Service.
legal.title: Legal Tags

tags.title: Tag Dictionary
tags.description: A generic dictionary of string keys mapping to string value. Only strings are permitted as keys and values.

createTime.description: Timestamp of the time at which initial version of this OSDU resource object was created. Set by the System. The value is a combined date-time string in ISO-8601 given in UTC.
createTime.title: Resource Object Creation DateTime

createUser.title: Resource Object Creation User Reference
createUser.description: The user reference, which created the first version of this resource object. Set by the System.

modifyTime.description: Timestamp of the time at which this version of the OSDU resource object was created. Set by the System. The value is a combined date-time string in ISO-8601 given in UTC.
modifyTime.title: Resource Object Version Creation DateTime

modifyUser.title: Resource Object Version Creation User Reference
modifyUser.description: The user reference, which created this version of this resource object. Set by the System.

ancestry.description: The links to data, which constitute the inputs, from which this record instance is derived.
ancestry.title: Ancestry

meta.description: The Frame of Reference meta data section linking the named properties to self-contained definitions.
meta.title: Frame of Reference Meta Data

WellboreID.title: Wellbore ID
WellboreID.description: A link to the Wellbore in which the stimulation took place.

WellActivityID.title: Well Activity ID
WellActivityID.description: A link to the Well Activity to which this stimulation job was performed.

StimulationJobID.title: Stimulation Job ID
StimulationJobID.description: The SRN of the parent Stimulation Job in which the Stage was performed.

StageNumber.title: StageNumber
StageNumber.description: The number associated with the stage.

StageStartDateTime.title: Stage Start Date Time
StageStartDateTime.description: Starting date and time for the stage treatment.

StageEndDateTime.title: Stage End Date Time
StageEndDateTime.description: Ending date and time for the stage treatment.

IntervalTopMeasuredDepth.title: Interval Top Measured Depth
IntervalTopMeasuredDepth.description: Measured depth at the top of the stimulated interval.

IntervalBaseMeasuredDepth.title: Interval Base Measured Depth
IntervalBaseMeasuredDepth.description: Measured depth at base of the stimulated interval.

IntervalTopTrueVerticalDepth.title: Interval Top True Vertical Depth
IntervalTopTrueVerticalDepth.description: True Vertical depth at top of interval.

IntervalBaseTrueVerticalDepth.title: Interval Base True Vertical Depth
IntervalBaseTrueVerticalDepth.description: True Vertical depth at base of interval.

StageIntervalLength.title: Stage Interval Length
StageIntervalLength.description: Length (along hole measured depth) of the stimulated interval.

HoleSectionID.title: Hole Section Identifier
HoleSectionID.description: The Hole Section stimulated during this job Stage.

JobEvent.title: Job Event
JobEvent.description: Timed comments for this job stage of the stim job.

items.title: Stim Event
items.description: Timed comments for this job stage of the stim job.

DateTime.title: Date Time
DateTime.description: Date and time of this event.

NumberStep.title: Number Step
NumberStep.description: Step number. Use it to reference an existing job step entry.

Comment.title: Comment
Comment.description: A short description of the event.
Comment.example: Max acheivable rate 350 L/minute at 61.75 MPa. FLBK 50 m3 at 0.9 m3/min average.

items.title: Job Step
items.description:
Summary of the pumping schedule, also known as 'pumping stages', sub-stages or event level details.  
This is where you define pressures, rates, volumes, amount of proppant for the Displacement, Flush, Pad, Ramp, etc steps in the pumping operation for this job stage.

StepName.title: Step Name
StepName.description: A human readable name for this job step.

Description.title: Description
Description.description: A short description of the job step.
Description.example: Pump Main Body w/ 40/70 Ottawa Sand

StepStartDateTime.title: Step Start Date Time
StepStartDateTime.description: Date and time the step started.

StepEndDateTime.title: Step End Date Time
StepEndDateTime.description: Date and time the step ended.

Fluid.title: Fluid
Fluid.description: Fluid used for this job step of the stimulated interval.

AdditiveConcentration.title: Additive Concentration
AdditiveConcentration.description: Concentrations of additives in the fluid for this job step.

FilterSize.title: Filter Size
FilterSize.description: The filter size that the fluid for this job step passes through.

FilterType.title: Filter Type
FilterType.description: The type of fluid filter used for this job step.

FluidSurfaceTemperature.title: Fluid Surface Temperature
FluidSurfaceTemperature.description: The temperature of the fluid at surface.

FluidTestPressure.title: FluidTestPressure
FluidTestPressure.description: Test pressure of the fluid during this job step.

FluidTestTemperature.title: FluidTestTemperature
FluidTestTemperature.description: Test temperature of the fluid for this job step.

GelStrength10Sec.title: Gel Strength10 Sec
GelStrength10Sec.description: The shear stress measured at low shear rate after a mud has set quiescently for 10 seconds.

GelStrength10Min.title: Gel Strength10 Min
GelStrength10Min.description: The shear stress measured at low shear rate after a mud has set quiescently for 10 minutes.

IsKillFluid.title: Is Kill Fluid
IsKillFluid.description: Is the fluid a kill fluid?

SpecificGravity.title: Specific Gravity
SpecificGravity.description: The specific gravity of the fluid at surface.

Supplier.title: Supplier
Supplier.description: The name of the fluid supplier for this job step.

Viscosity.title: Viscosity
Viscosity.description: Viscosity of the stimulation fluid for this job step.

FluidReportID.title: Fluid Report Identifier
FluidReportID.description: Fluid Report Identifier of the fluid used for this Job Step

BallsUsed.title: Balls Used
BallsUsed.description: Balls used during execution of the step.

BallsRecovered.title: Balls Recovered
BallsRecovered.description: Balls recovered during execution of the step.

BaseFluidBypassVolume.title: Base Fluid Bypass Volume
BaseFluidBypassVolume.description: Base fluid volume recorded after equipment set to bypass.

BaseFluidVolumeEquip.title: Base Fluid Volume Equipment
BaseFluidVolumeEquip.description: Base fluid volume entering the equipment.

CO2BaseFluidQualityAvg.title: CO2 Base Fluid Quality Average
CO2BaseFluidQualityAvg.description: Base quality carbon dioxide percent of foam.

CO2SurfaceRateEnd.title: CO2 Surface Rate End
CO2SurfaceRateEnd.description: Final CO2 pump rate in volume per time at the surface.

FluidBaseVolume.title: Fluid Base Volume
FluidBaseVolume.description: The step volume of the base fluid.

FractureGradientInitial.title: Fracture Gradient Initial
FractureGradientInitial.description: The fracture gradient before starting the step.

FractureGradientFinal.title: Fracture Gradient Final
FractureGradientFinal.description: The fracture gradient when the step ends.

FrictionFactor.title: Friction Factor
FrictionFactor.description: Numeric value used to scale a calculated rheological friction.

HhpAvg.title: Hhp Average
HhpAvg.description: Average hydraulic horsepower used during the step.

HhpMax.title: Hhp Maximum
HhpMax.description: Maximum hydraulic horsepower used during the step.

InternalPhaseFractionAvg.title: Internal Phase Fraction Average
InternalPhaseFractionAvg.description: Internal gas phase percentage of the foam.

MaterialUsedRateStart.title: Material Used Rate Start
MaterialUsedRateStart.description: Starting quantity of material used per minute entering the flow stream.

MaterialUsedRateEnd.title: Material Used Rate End
MaterialUsedRateEnd.description: Ending quantity of material used per minute entering the flow stream.

MaterialUsedRateMax.title: Material Used Rate Max
MaterialUsedRateMax.description: Maximum rate of material used per minute entering the flow stream.

MaterialUsedRateAvg.title: Material Used Rate Average
MaterialUsedRateAvg.description: Average material used per minute entering the flow stream.

N2BaseFluidQualityAvg.title: N2 Base Fluid Quality Average
N2BaseFluidQualityAvg.description: Nitrogen base quality percentage of foam.

N2SurfaceRateEnd.title: N2 Surface Rate End
N2SurfaceRateEnd.description: Final nitrogen pump rate at the surface.

PipeFrictionPressureLoss.title: Pipe Friction Pressure Loss
PipeFrictionPressureLoss.description: The friction pressure loss contribution from pipe.

ProppantConcAvg.title: Proppant Conc Average
ProppantConcAvg.description: Average proppant concentration at the wellhead.

ProppantConcBHStart.title: Proppant Conc BH Start
ProppantConcBHStart.description: The initial proppant concentration at bottomhole.

ProppantConcBHEnd.title: Proppant Conc BH End
ProppantConcBHEnd.description: The final proppant concentration at bottomhole.

ProppantConcBHMax.title: Proppant Conc BH Max
ProppantConcBHMax.description: Maximum proppant concentration at bottomhole during the stimulation step.

ProppantConcBHAvg.title: Proppant Conc BH Average
ProppantConcBHAvg.description: The average proppant concentration at bottomhole.

ProppantConcSurfaceStart.title: Proppant Conc Surface Start
ProppantConcSurfaceStart.description: The initial proppant concentration at the surface.

ProppantConcSurfaceEnd.title: Proppant Conc Surface End
ProppantConcSurfaceEnd.description: The final proppant concentration at the surface.

ProppantConcSurfaceMax.title: Proppant Conc Surface Max
ProppantConcSurfaceMax.description: Maximum proppant concentration at the wellhead.

ProppantConcSurfaceAvg.title: Proppant Conc Surface Average
ProppantConcSurfaceAvg.description: The average proppant concentration at the surface.

ProppantSlurryConcAvg.title: Proppant Slurry Conc Average
ProppantSlurryConcAvg.description: Average proppant concentration exiting the equipment.

ProppantSlurryConcMax.title: Proppant Slurry Conc Max
ProppantSlurryConcMax.description: Maximum proppant concentration exiting the equipment.

PumpTime.title: Pump Time
PumpTime.description: Total pumping time for the step.

SlurryFluidVolume.title: Slurry Fluid Volume
SlurryFluidVolume.description: The volume of the slurry (dirty) for this job step.

WellheadFlowRateAvg.title: Wellhead Flow Rate Avg
WellheadFlowRateAvg.description: Average flow rate at the wellhead.

WellheadFlowRateMax.title: Wellhead Flow Rate Max
WellheadFlowRateMax.description: Maximum flow rate at the wellhead.

Remarks.title: Remarks
Remarks.description: General remarks about this job step.

Diversion.title: Diversion
Diversion.description: Diversion details for the stimulated interval.

DiversionMethodID.title: Diversion Method ID
DiversionMethodID.description: The diversion method used for this job stage.

ToolDescription.title: Tool Description
ToolDescription.description: A supplier description of the diversion tool, such as its commercial name.

FlowPath.title: Flow Path
FlowPath.description: Details about the downhole equipment design for this stimulation interval.

BreakDownPressure.title: Break Down Pressure
BreakDownPressure.description: The downhole pressure at which the formation broke.

BridgePlugMeasuredDepth.title: Bridge Plug Measured Depth
BridgePlugMeasuredDepth.description: The measured depth of a bridge plug.

BridgePlugRemovalDate.title: Bridge Plug Removal Date
BridgePlugRemovalDate.description: Date that the bridge plug for this stage was removed.

TubingBottomMeasuredDepth.title: Tubing Bottom Measured Depth
TubingBottomMeasuredDepth.description: The maximum measured depth of the tubing used for treatment of a stage.

FractureGradient.title: Fracture Gradient
FractureGradient.description: The formation fracture gradient for this treatment flow path.

FlowPathTypeID.title: Flow Path Type ID
FlowPathTypeID.description: The type of stim flow path.

OpenHoleFrictionFactor.title: Open Hole Friction Factor
OpenHoleFrictionFactor.description: The friction factor used to compute openhole pressure loss.

PackerMeasuredDepth.title: Packer Measured Depth
PackerMeasuredDepth.description: The measured depth of a packer.

PipeFrictionFactor.title: PipeFriction Factor
PipeFrictionFactor.description: The friction factor for the pipe, tubing, and/or casing.

PmaxPacPressureAvg.title: Pmax Packer Pressure Average
PmaxPacPressureAvg.description: PMax prediction allows the tool assembly to be designed with expected pressures. It determines maximum allowable surface pressure and is typically calculated as a single number by which the pressure relief valves are set. This variable is the average of all the pmax pressures calculated for this flow path.

PmaxPacPressureMax.title: Pmax Packer Pressure Max
PmaxPacPressureMax.description: PMax prediction allows the tool assembly to be designed with expected pressures. It determines maximum allowable surface pressure and is typically calculated as a single number by which the pressure relief valves are set. This variable is the maximum of all the pmax pressures calculated for this flow path.

PmaxWeaklinkPressureAvg.title: Pmax Weaklink Pressure Average
PmaxWeaklinkPressureAvg.description: Average allowable pressure for the zone of interest with respect to the bottomhole assembly during the stimulation services.

PmaxWeaklinkPressureMax.title: Pmax Weaklink Pressure Max
PmaxWeaklinkPressureMax.description: Maximum allowable pressure for the zone of interest with respect to the bottomhole assembly during the stimulation services.

Remarks.title: Remarks
Remarks.description: General remarks about the flow path for this job stage.

FluidPumpRateAvg.title: Fluid Pump Rate Avg
FluidPumpRateAvg.description: Average fluid pumping rate for all job Steps while treating the Stage.

FluidPumpRateMax.title: Fluid Pump Rate Max
FluidPumpRateMax.description: Maximum fluid pumping rate of any Step while treating the Stage.

AnnulusPressureAvg.title: Annulus Pressure Average
AnnulusPressureAvg.description: The average annulus pressure for all job steps for the stage treatment.

AnnulusPressureMax.title: Annulus Pressure Max
AnnulusPressureMax.description: The highest annulus pressure for all job steps while treating the stage.

BaseFluidReturnRateAvg.title: Base Fluid Return Rate Average
BaseFluidReturnRateAvg.description: Average base fluid return flow rate of all Steps for this Stage.

BHPumpRateAvg.title: Bottomhole Pump Rate Average
BHPumpRateAvg.description: Average bottomhole flow rate for this Stage.

DHStaticTemperatureAvg.title: Downhole Static Temperature Average
DHStaticTemperatureAvg.description: The average static temperature of the wellbore injection point(s) or formation at equilibrium (steady state) with no fluid or tool movement, allowing for equilibrium conditions at the wellbore injection point; (DHST: down hole static temperature.

BodyVolume.title: Body Volume
BodyVolume.description: The volume pumped for the body portion of the stage treatment.

BreakDownPressure.title: Break Down Pressure
BreakDownPressure.description: The pressure at which the formation fractures and accepts injected fluid.

CasingPumpRateMax.title: Casing Pump Rate Max
CasingPumpRateMax.description: Maximum casing fluid pumping rate of any step while treating the stage.

CasingPressureAvg.title: Casing Pressure Average
CasingPressureAvg.description: The average casing pressure of any step for the stage treatment.

CasingPressureMax.title: Casing Pressure Max
CasingPressureMax.description: The highest casing pressure of any step while treating the stage.

ClosureDuration.title: Closure Duration
ClosureDuration.description: Delta time recorded for the closure of the fracture to occur during the stage treatment.

ClosurePressure.title: Closure Pressure
ClosurePressure.description: An analysis parameter used in hydraulic fracture design to indicate the pressure at which the fracture effectively closes without proppant in place.

ConductivityAvg.title: Conductivity Average
ConductivityAvg.description: Average conductivity of a fracture created during the treatment supported by proppant during the stimulation services. Hydraulic conductivity, symbolically represented as K, is a property of vascular plants, soil or rock, that describes the ease with which water can move through pore spaces or fractures. It depends on the intrinsic permeability of the material and on the degree of saturation. Saturated hydraulic conductivity, Ksat, describes water movement through saturated media.

FlushVolume.title: Flush Volume
FlushVolume.description: Volume pumped during flush portion of stage treatment.

FormationBreakLengthPerDay.title: Formation Break Length Per Day
FormationBreakLengthPerDay.description: The length of formation broken (fracced) per day.

FormationName.title: Formation Name
FormationName.description: The name of the formation being stimulated in this job stage.

WellboreMarketSetID.title: Wellbore Marker Set ID
WellboreMarketSetID.description: ID to the Wellbore Marker Set containing the Marker (Formation Top) that is stimulated in the Job Stage

WellboreMarkerID.title: Wellbore Marker ID
WellboreMarkerID.description: ID to the Wellbore Marker within the Wellbore Marker Set that is stimulated in the Job Stage

ReservoirID.title: Reservoir ID
ReservoirID.description: Identifier to the Reservoir stimulated in the Job Stage

ReservoirSegmentID.title: Reservoir Segment ID
ReservoirSegmentID.description: Identifier to the Reservoir Segment stimulated in the Job Stage

FormationTopMeasuredDepth.title: Formation Top Measured Depth
FormationTopMeasuredDepth.description: Measured depth of the top of the formation.

FormationTopTrueVerticalDepth.title: Formation Top True Vertical Depth
FormationTopTrueVerticalDepth.description: True vertical depth of the top of the formation.

FormationBottomMeasuredDepth.title: Formation Bottom Measured Depth
FormationBottomMeasuredDepth.description: Measured depth of the bottom of the formation.

FormationBottomTrueVerticalDepth.title: Formation Bottom True Vertical Depth
FormationBottomTrueVerticalDepth.description: True vertical depth of the bottom of the formation.

FractureGradientInitial.title: Fracture Gradient Initial
FractureGradientInitial.description: The formation fracture gradient for stage before treatment.

FractureGradientFinal.title: Fracture Gradient Final
FractureGradientFinal.description: The formation fracture gradient for the stage after treatment.

FractureHeight.title: Fracture Height
FractureHeight.description: The height of the fracture  created after treating the stage.

FractureLength.title: Fracture Length
FractureLength.description: The length of the fracture created after treating the stage.

FractureWidthAvg.title: Fracture Width Average
FractureWidthAvg.description: Average fracture width created during the treatment of the stage.

FrictionPressure.title: Friction Pressure
FrictionPressure.description: Friction pressure loss encountered by fluid transported to stage interval.

HHPAvg.title: HHP Average
HHPAvg.description: Average hydraulic horse power used for the stage.

HHPMax.title: HHP Max
HHPMax.description: Maximum hydraulic horse power used for the stage.

HHPOrderedCO2.title: HHP Ordered CO2
HHPOrderedCO2.description: Carbon dioxide hydraulic horsepower ordered for the stage.

HHPOrderedFluid.title: HHP Ordered Fluid
HHPOrderedFluid.description: Fluid hydraulic horsepower ordered for the stage.

HHPUsedCO2.title: HHP Used CO2
HHPUsedCO2.description: Carbon dioxide hydraulic horsepower actually used for the stage.

HHPUsedFluid.title: HHP Used Fluid
HHPUsedFluid.description: Fluid hydraulic horsepower actually used for the stage.

IsScreenedOut.title: Is Screened Out
IsScreenedOut.description: Did screen out occur? True (true or 1) indicates that screen out occurred. False (false or 0) or not given indicates otherwise.

MaterialUsageRateMax.title: Material Usage Rate Max
MaterialUsageRateMax.description: Usage and maximum mass or volume flow rates for a material for this job stage.

MaterialUsage.title: Material Used
MaterialUsage.description: Material used during this job stage. For example, proppant or gel (additive).

NetPressure.title: Net Pressure
NetPressure.description: The difference between the pressure which holds a fracture closed (minimal principal stress) and that pressure which is necessary to open the fracture.

OpenHoleDiameter.title: Open Hole Diameter
OpenHoleDiameter.description: The diameter of the open hole.

OpenHoleName.title: Open Hole Name
OpenHoleName.description: A name for the open hole. To be used for open hole completions.

PadPercent.title: Pad Percent
PadPercent.description: The percentage of volume pumped used for the pad.

PadVolume.title: Pad Volume
PadVolume.description: Volume pumped for pad portion of stage treatment.

PumpDiagnosticSession.title: Pump Diagnostic Session
PumpDiagnosticSession.description: A pumping diagnostics session for this job stage.

items.title: Stim Job Diagnostic Session
items.description: A pumping diagnostics session for this job stage.

StageNumber.title: Stage Number
StageNumber.description: The number of the stage associated with this diagnostics session.

Number.title: Number
Number.description: The number of this pumping diagnostics session.

Name.title: Name
Name.description: The name of this pumping diagnostic session.

Description.title: Description
Description.description: A description of this pumping diagnostic session.

StepDownTest.title: Step Down Test
StepDownTest.description: An injection test involving multiple steps of injection rate and pressure, where a curve deflection and change of slope indicates the fracture breakdown pressure. An injection test involving multiple steps of injection rate and pressure, where a curve deflection and change of slope indicates the fracture breakdown pressure.

items.title: Stim Step Down Test
items.description: An injection test involving multiple steps of injection rate and pressure, where a curve deflection and change of slope indicates the fracture breakdown pressure.

FlowBackTestStep.title: Flow Back Test Step
FlowBackTestStep.description: The data related to a particular step in the step-down test.

items.title: Stim Pump Flow Back Test Step
items.description: Details about this flowback test step.

StepNumber.title: Step Number
StepNumber.description: The number of the step. Identifies the step within the step down test.

DateTime.title: Date Time
DateTime.description: Time stamp of the pressure measurement.

BHFlowRate.title: Bottomhole Flow Rate
BHFlowRate.description: Bottomhole flow rate for the specific step.

EntryFriction.title: Entry Friction
EntryFriction.description: Calculated entry friction loss accounting for perforation and near wellbore restrictions for the specific step.

FlowbackVolume.title: Flowback Volume
FlowbackVolume.description: Cumulative volume of flowback since the start of the test.

NearWellboreFriction.title: Near Wellbore Friction
NearWellboreFriction.description: Calculated near-wellbore friction loss for the specific step.

PerfFrictionLoss.title: Perf Friction Loss
PerfFrictionLoss.description: Calculated perforation friction loss for the specific step.

PipeFrictionLoss.title: Pipe FrictionLoss
PipeFrictionLoss.description: Calculated pipe friction loss for the specific step.

SurfacePressure.title: SurfacePressure
SurfacePressure.description: Surface pressure measured for the specific step.

SurfaceFlowRate.title: Surface Flow Rate
SurfaceFlowRate.description: Surface flow rate entering the well for the specific step.

BHFluidDensity.title: BH Fluid Density
BHFluidDensity.description: The density of the fluid at the bottom of the hole adjusting for bottomhole temperature and pressure during the step-down test.

DischargeCoefficient.title: Discharge Coefficient
DischargeCoefficient.description: A coefficient used in the equation for calculation of the pressure drop across a perforation set.

EntryHoleDiameter.title: Entry Hole Diameter
EntryHoleDiameter.description: Diameter of the injection point or perforation.

PerforationsEffective.title: Perforations Effective
PerforationsEffective.description: The number of perforations in the interval being tested that are calculated to be open to injection, which is determined during the step-down test.

PerforationsTotal.title: Perforations Total
PerforationsTotal.description: The total number of perforations in the interval being tested.

Remarks.title: Remarks
Remarks.description: General remarks about this Stim Step Down Test.

StepRateTest.title: Step Rate Test
StepRateTest.description: An injection test, plotted pressure against injection rate, where a curve deflection and change of slope indicates the fracture breakdown pressure.

items.title: Stim Step Test
items.description: An injection test, plotted pressure against injection rate, where a curve deflection and change of slope indicates the fracture breakdown pressure.

FractureExtensionPressure.title: Fracture Extension Pressure
FractureExtensionPressure.description: The pressure necessary to extend the fracture once initiated. The fracture extension pressure may rise slightly with increasing fracture length andor height because of friction pressure drop down the length of the fracture.

PressureMeasurement.title: Pressure Measurement
PressureMeasurement.description: A pressure and fluid flow rate data set.

items.title: Stim Pressure Flow Rate
items.description: An array of bottom hole flow rates and pressures for this stim step test.

BHFlowRate.title: BH Flow Rate
BHFlowRate.description: The bottomhole flow rate of the fluid.

Pressure.title: Pressure
Pressure.description: The pressure of the step test.

BaseFluidVol.title: Base Fluid Volume
BaseFluidVol.description: Base fluid volume entering the pumping equipment.

BHMeasuredDepth.title: BH Measured Depth
BHMeasuredDepth.description: The measured depth of the bottom of the hole.

BubblePointPressure.title: Bubble Point Pressure
BubblePointPressure.description: The pressure at which gas begins to break out of an under saturated oil and form a free gas phase in the matrix or a gas cap.

ChokeSize.title: Choke Size
ChokeSize.description: The size of the choke used during a flow back test.

FluidCompressibility.title: Fluid Compressibility
FluidCompressibility.description: The volume change of a fluid when pressure is applied.

FluidDensity.title: Fluid Density
FluidDensity.description: The density of the fluid during this pumping diagnostic session.

FluidEfficiency.title: Fluid Efficiency
FluidEfficiency.description: A measurement, derived from a data frac, of the efficiency of a particular fluid in creating fracture area on a particular formation at a set of conditions.

FluidEfficiencyTest.title: Fluid Efficiency Test
FluidEfficiencyTest.description: A diagnostic test determining fluid efficiency.

items.title: Stim Fluid Efficiency Test
items.description: Fluid Efficiency Test for this pumping diagnostic session.

AnalysisMethodID.title: Analysis Method ID
AnalysisMethodID.description: An analysis method used for this FET.

FluidEfficiency.title: Fluid Efficiency
FluidEfficiency.description: A measurement, derived from a data frac, of the efficiency of a particular fluid in creating fracture area on a particular formation at a set of conditions.

FractureCloseDuration.title: Fracture Close Duration
FractureCloseDuration.description: The time required for the fracture to effectively close without proppant in place.

FractureClosePressure.title: Fracture Close Pressure
FractureClosePressure.description: The pressure at which the fracture effectively closes without proppant in place.

FractureExtensionPressure.title: Fracture Extension Pressure
FractureExtensionPressure.description: The fracture pressure limit for an unfractured formation is the fracture initiation pressure. This is typically considered the upper bound for the minimum horizontal stress or closure pressure. A step-rate test is used to determine the fracture extension pressure.

FractureGradient.title: Fracture Gradient
FractureGradient.description: The fracture gradient of the formation.

FractureLength.title: Fracture Length
FractureLength.description: The length of the fracture tip to tip; fracture half length is the length of one wing of a fracture from the wellbore to the tip.

FractureWidth.title: Fracture Width
FractureWidth.description: The width of a fracture at the wellbore. Hydraulic frac width is generated by frac fluid viscosity andor pump rate (i.e., horsepower).

NetPressure.title: Net Pressure
NetPressure.description: The difference between the fracture extension pressure and the pressure that exists in the fracture.

PdlEndDuration.title: Pdl End Duration
PdlEndDuration.description: The end of the pressure-dependent leak-off portion of the FET.

PorePressure.title: Pore Pressure
PorePressure.description: The pressure of the liquids in the formation pore space.

PseudoRadialPressure.title: Pseudo Radial Pressure
PseudoRadialPressure.description: The Horner plot is used to determine if pseudo-radial flow developed during pressure decline. If a semi-log straight line is observed and the line can be extrapolated to a reasonable value of reservoir pressure, then radial or pseudo-radial flow may be affecting the decline behavior. This suggests that the fracture is already closed and that data beyond the point of influence need not be considered in the evaluation of closure.

ResidualPermeability.title: Residual Permeability
ResidualPermeability.description: That permeability which remains after a fractured formation has closed, allowing the the formation fracture face to be pressurized before the fracture is mechanically reopened.

FluidKprimeFactor.title: Fluid Kprime Factor
FluidKprimeFactor.description: The consistency index K is the shear stress or viscosity of the fluid at one sec-1 shear rate. An increasing K raises the effective viscosity.

FluidNprimeFactor.title: Fluid Nprime Factor
FluidNprimeFactor.description: Power law component. As 'n' decreases from 1, the fluid becomes more shear thinning. Reducing 'n' produces more non-Newtonian behavior.

FluidSpecificHeat.title: Fluid Specific Heat
FluidSpecificHeat.description: The heat required to raise one unit mass of a substance by one degree.

FluidThermalConductivity.title: Fluid Thermal Conductivity
FluidThermalConductivity.description: In physics, thermal conductivity is the property of a material describing its ability to conduct heat. It appears primarily in Fourier's Law for heat conduction. Thermal conductivity is measured in watts per kelvin-meter. Multiplied by a temperature difference (in kelvins) and an area (in square meters), and divided by a thickness (in meters), the thermal conductivity predicts the rate of energy loss (in watts) through a piece of material.

FluidThermalExpansionCoefficient.title: Fluid Thermal Expansion Coefficient
FluidThermalExpansionCoefficient.description: Dimensional response to temperature change is expressed by its coefficient of thermal expansion. When the temperature of a substance changes, the energy that is stored in the intermolecular bonds between atoms also changes. When the stored energy increases, so does the length of the molecular bonds. As a result, solids typically expand in response to heating and contract on cooling. The degree of expansion divided by the change in temperature is called the material's coefficient of thermal expansion and generally varies with temperature.

FoamQuality.title: Foam Quality
FoamQuality.description: Foam quality percentage of foam for the pumping diagnostic session during the stimulation services.

FractureCloseDateTime.title: Fracture Close Date Time
FractureCloseDateTime.description: The date and time when the fluid in the fracture is completely leaked off into the formation and the fracture closes on its faces.

FractureClosePressure.title: Fracture Close Pressure
FractureClosePressure.description: The pressure when the fracture width becomes zero.

FrictionPressure.title: Friction Pressure
FrictionPressure.description: The pressure loss due to fluid friction with the pipe while a fluid is being pumped.

IsTemperatureCorrectionApplied.title: Is Temperature Correction Applied
IsTemperatureCorrectionApplied.description: Are the calculations corrected for temperature? A value of true (or 1) indicates that the calculations were corrected for temperature. A value of false (or 0) or not given indicates otherwise.

MidPerforationMeasuredDepth.title: Mid Perforation Measured Depth
MidPerforationMeasuredDepth.description: The measured depth of the middle perforation (MPP).

MidPerforationTrueVerticalDepth.title: Mid Perforation True Vertical Depth
MidPerforationTrueVerticalDepth.description: The true vertical depth of the middle perforation.

PadPercent.title: Pad Percent
PadPercent.description: The volume of the pad divided by the (volume of the pad + the volume of the proppant laden fluid).

PorePressure.title: Pore Pressure
PorePressure.description: The pressure of the liquids in the formation pore space.

PumpDuration.title: Pump Duration
PumpDuration.description: The time between the shutin time and the pump on time.

PumpFlowBackTest.title: Pump Flow Back Test
PumpFlowBackTest.description: A diagnostic test involving flowing a well back after treatment.

items.title: StimPumpFlowBackTest
items.description: Pump flow back test for this stim job diagnostic session.

items.title: Stim Pump Flow Back Test Step
items.description: Details about this flowback test step.

StepNumber.title: Step Number
StepNumber.description: The number of the step. Identifies the step within the step down test.

DateTime.title: Date Time
DateTime.description: Time stamp of the pressure measurement.

BHFlowRate.title: Bottomhole Flow Rate
BHFlowRate.description: Bottomhole flow rate for the specific step.

EntryFriction.title: Entry Friction
EntryFriction.description: Calculated entry friction loss accounting for perforation and near wellbore restrictions for the specific step.

FlowbackVolume.title: Flowback Volume
FlowbackVolume.description: Cumulative volume of flowback since the start of the test.

NearWellboreFriction.title: Near Wellbore Friction
NearWellboreFriction.description: Calculated near-wellbore friction loss for the specific step.

PerfFrictionLoss.title: Perf Friction Loss
PerfFrictionLoss.description: Calculated perforation friction loss for the specific step.

PipeFrictionLoss.title: Pipe FrictionLoss
PipeFrictionLoss.description: Calculated pipe friction loss for the specific step.

SurfacePressure.title: SurfacePressure
SurfacePressure.description: Surface pressure measured for the specific step.

SurfaceFlowRate.title: Surface Flow Rate
SurfaceFlowRate.description: Surface flow rate entering the well for the specific step.

FlowBackVolume.title: Flow Back Volume
FlowBackVolume.description: Total fluid volume recovered during a flow back test.

FractureCloseDuration.title: Fracture Close Duration
FractureCloseDuration.description: The time required for the fracture width to become zero.

FractureClosePressure.title: Fracture Close Pressure
FractureClosePressure.description: The pressure when the fracture width becomes zero.

Remarks.title: Remarks
Remarks.description: General remarks for this stim pump flow back test.

PumpOffDateTime.title: Pump Off Date Time
PumpOffDateTime.description: The date and time pumping ended.

PumpOnDateTime.title: Pump On Date Time
PumpOnDateTime.description: The date and time pumping began.

ReservoirTotalCompressibility.title: Reservoir Total Compressibility
ReservoirTotalCompressibility.description: The volume change of a reservoir material when pressure is applied.

SurfaceFluidTemperature.title: Surface Fluid Temperature
SurfaceFluidTemperature.description: Temperature of the fluid at the surface.

InjectionPointMeasuredDepth.title: Injection Point Measured Depth
InjectionPointMeasuredDepth.description: The measured depth of the wellbore to its injection point.

SurfaceTemperature.title: Surface Temperature
SurfaceTemperature.description: The temperature at surface during this pumping diagnostic session.

WellboreVolume.title: Wellbore Volume
WellboreVolume.description: The volume of fluid in the wellbore for this pumping diagnostic session.

WellShutinDateTime.title: Well Shutin Date Time
WellShutinDateTime.description: The date and time at which a well ceases flowing and the valves are closed.

PerfBallCount.title: Perf Ball Count
PerfBallCount.description: Total number of perforation balls used while treating the stage.

PerfBallSize.title: Perf Ball Size
PerfBallSize.description: The size (diameter) of the perforation balls used while treating the Stage

ProppantBHConcAvg.title: Proppant Bottomhole Concentration Average
ProppantBHConcAvg.description: The average proppant concentration at the bottom of the interval.

ProppantBHConcMax.title: Proppant Bottomhole Concentration Max
ProppantBHConcMax.description: The maximum proppant concentration at the bottom of the stage interval for all job steps.

ProppantDesignMass.title: Proppant Design Mass
ProppantDesignMass.description: The planned, total proppant mass for this job stage.

ProppantInFormationMass.title: Proppant In Formation Mass
ProppantInFormationMass.description: The weight of proppant placed in the formation.

ProppantInFormationTotal.title: Proppant In Formation Total
ProppantInFormationTotal.description: The cumulative total amount of proppant in the formation including the current stage.

ProppantPerforationConc.title: Proppant Perforation Concentration
ProppantPerforationConc.description: The proppant concentration at the perforations.

ProppantPumpedPercent.title: Proppant Pumped Percent
ProppantPumpedPercent.description: Total proppant mass used as a percent of the design mass.

ProppantSurfaceConcAvg.title: Proppant Surface Conc Average
ProppantSurfaceConcAvg.description: The average proppant concentration on the surface.

ProppantSurfaceConcMax.title: Proppant Surface Conc Max
ProppantSurfaceConcMax.description: The maximum proppant concentration on the surface.

ProppantWellboreMass.title: Proppant Wellbore Mass
ProppantWellboreMass.description: The weight of proppant left in the wellbore after pumping has stopped.

PumpTimeTotal.title: Pump Time Total
PumpTimeTotal.description: The total pumping time for the treatment of the stage.

ShutInPressure.title: Shut In Pressure
ShutInPressure.description: Shut in pressure data for this job stage.

items.title: Stim Shut In Pressure
items.description: Shut in pressure data for this job stage.

TimeAfterShutin.title: Time After Shutin
TimeAfterShutin.description: The cumulative time span after shut-in at which the pressure was measured.

SlurryReturnRateAvg.title: Slurry Return Rate Average
SlurryReturnRateAvg.description: The average slurry return rate of all steps for the stage treatment.

SurfacePressureAvg.title: Surface Pressure Average
SurfacePressureAvg.description: The average pressure for treating the stage across all steps.

SurfacePressureMax.title: Surface Pressure Max
SurfacePressureMax.description: Maximum surface pressure during treatment of the stage.

TechnologyDescription.title: Technology Description
TechnologyDescription.description: Text describing the technology used while pumping the stage.

BHTreatingTemperatureAvg.title: Bottomhole Treating Temperature Average
BHTreatingTemperatureAvg.description: The average measured or calculated bottom hole temperature whilst pumping with well fluid injection or circulation of the wellbore at the point of interest. Point of interest is generally the injection point or region of interest for the test or treatment.

TubingFluidRateMax.title: Tubing Fluid Rate Max
TubingFluidRateMax.description: Maximum tubing fluid pumping rate of any step while treating the stage.

TubingPressureAvg.title: Tubing Pressure Average
TubingPressureAvg.description: The average tubing pressure for the stage treatment.

TubingPressureMax.title: Tubing Pressure Max
TubingPressureMax.description: The highest tubing pressure of any step while treating the stage.

SlurryVolumeTotal.title: Slurry VolumeTotal
SlurryVolumeTotal.description: The total slurry volume pumped for all steps while treating the stage.

WaterSource.title: Water Source
WaterSource.description: Water source description for fluid pumped during stage.

PerforationSet.title: Perforation Set
PerforationSet.description: Set of Perforation Intervals stimulated in this stage.

WellLog.title: Well Logs
WellLog.description: Log(s) associated to the Stimulation Stage

Remarks.title: Remarks
Remarks.description: General remarks about this Stage of the Stim Job.
Remarks.example: Screened out observing 1.5T in formation, 1.5T in wellbore, max acheivable rate 350 L/minute at 61.75 MPa. FLBK 50 m3 at 0.9 m3/min average. Attempted to Flush Wellbore observing 24 m3 to seat ball. Established feed rate 0.5 m3/min at 60 MPa. Displaced 1 m3 HCR to perfs and let soak 5 min. Re-initiated frac as per.
